results.name: Triangle T(n,m) read by rows: The number of m-Schroeder paths of order n with 2 diagonal steps.

reference: Chunwei Song, The Generalized Schroeder Theory, El. J. Combin. 12 (2005) #R53 Theorem 2.1.
